changeSet.author: sundonghui
changeSet.sql: update clientforwardpriceinfo c set areano = (select areano from sendarea where id = c.sendareaid)
update clientforwardpriceinfo c set incommon = 1

column.name: templatevalue

changeSet.author: jiangyongliang
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE outstock ALTER column milliseconds type NUMERIC

changeSet.author: CXW
changeSet.sql: update expresstemplate t set template_img_url=(select templateimgurl from forwardcompany f where f.forwardcompanyid=t.transportid);

insert into sys_express_template(id,name,value,image,width,height,transport_id,is_default) select forwardcompanyid,name||'',templatevalue,templateimgurl,pagewidth,pageheight,forwardcompanyid,1 from forwardcompany;

insert into sys_express_template(id,name,value,image,width,height,transport_id,is_default) values('9802c351934746c5acf12163a7ddc900','',(select replace(templatevalue,'STO.jpg','TBSTO.jpg') from forwardcompany where forwardcompanyid='402881ec33c024850133c025918d0000'),'resource/kuaidi_template/TBSTO.jpg','869px','480px','402881ec33c024850133c025918d0000',0)

changeSet.author: CXW
changeSet.sql: update dispatchcodetemplate set templatename='' where clientid='9e728a8d27c44a7ba3d5b31afd092111';

changeSet.sql: update forwardcompany set type = 0,averagetranstime = 0,transtimes = 0,complaintimes = 0,servicequality = 0 where forwardcompanyid in('YWP20e1055944b20a2128d352416af72','BC85eb0ef04e488db5a9af1560f4103e');

changeSet.author: yeyanying
changeSet.sql: update warehouse a set clientid=(select b.clientid from clientwarehouse b where a.warehouseid=b.warehouseid limit 1)

changeSet.author: yeyanying
changeSet.createView: select slog.id as id,slog.createtime as changetime,c.name as clientname,p.name as gname,p. pres as pres,p.outerid as outerid,'' as instockcode,o.ordercode as ordercode, o.sendcode as sendcode,'' as datatype,0 as instockamount,slog.amount as outstockamount,wi.name || '('|| slog.amount ||')' as whitemamountstr,slog.creator as checkman, c.clientid as clientid,w.warehouseid as warehouseid, wi.name as winame,w.clientid as wclientid,slog.amount as amount from stocklog slog, outstock o,client_new c,kcbproductprop p,whitem wi,warehouse w where o.id=slog.referid and o.clientid=c.clientid and slog.goodsid=p.id and slog.itemid=wi.whitemid and wi.warehouseid=w.warehouseid union all select slog.id as id,slog.createtime as changetime,c.name as clientname,p.name as gname,p. pres as pres,p.outerid as outerid,ins.fromcode as instockcode,'' as ordercode, '' as sendcode,(case when ins.type=0 then '' else '' end )as datatype,slog.amount as instockamount,0 as outstockamount, wi.name || '('|| slog.amount ||')' as whitemamountstr,slog.creator as checkman, c.clientid as clientid,w.warehouseid as warehouseid, wi.name as winame,w.clientid as wclientid,slog.amount as amount from stocklog slog,instock ins,client_new c,kcbproductprop p,whitem wi,warehouse w where ins.instockid=slog.referid and slog.goodsid=p.id and ins.clientid=c.clientid and slog.itemid=wi.whitemid and wi.warehouseid=w.warehouseid union all select slog.id as id,slog.createtime as changetime,c.name as clientname,p.name as gname,p. pres as pres,p.outerid as outerid,'' as instockcode,'' as ordercode, '' as sendcode,'' as datatype,0 as instockamount,0 as outstockamount,wi.name || '('|| slog.amount ||')' as whitemamountstr,slog.creator as checkman, c.clientid as clientid,w.warehouseid as warehouseid, wi.name as winame,w.clientid as wclientid,slog.amount as amount from stocklog slog,client_new c,kcbproductprop p,whitem wi,warehouse w where p.client_id=c.clientid and slog.goodsid=p.id and slog.itemid=wi.whitemid and wi.warehouseid=w.warehouseid and slog.referid is null
